trends: There have been no other sightings in Harbor
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: at the 9 oclock posistion from the middle of Orions belt quick random movements
divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting ready to enter my car and happened to glance up in the eastern sky where I noticed Orions Belt when I hoticed what at first I thought was a satellite flashing different colors randomly as I was watching it the object made a quick jump straight up then across and back to its original position..I thought my eyes where playing tricks on me so I stared at another star and it did not move so after that I located the craft again and watched it move in several directions but always returned to its original position. As I was driving to work I would occasionally glance over and could still see it. Once I got to work I could no longer see it due to Parking Lot Lights.
